author: EMA; COMM; DG; UNIT
description: Preclinical pharmacological and toxicological testing of vaccines - Scientific guideline
cleaned_text: Preclinical pharmacological and toxicological testing of vaccines - Scientific guideline Table of contents Following discussion within the [CHMP](/en/glossary/chmp) Safety [Working Party](/en/glossary/working-party) and Vaccine [Working Party](/en/glossary/working-party), it has been agreed to remove the CPMP [guideline](/en/glossary/guideline) on preclinical pharmacological and toxicological testing of vaccines, and to refer to the WHO [guideline](/en/glossary/guideline) on nonclinical evaluation of vaccines.The aim of this Q&A document is to provide clarification on the grounds for this decision and the consequences thereof. Keywords: preclinical, vaccines, non-clinical requirements, WHO, pharmacology, toxicology
